text: Satan Triumphant () is a 1917 Russian silent drama movie directed by Yakov Protazanov.Третьяковская галерея прощается с выставкой "Некто 1917"В кинотеатре "Звезда" бесплатно покажут немое кино 1917 года It stars Pavel Pavlov, Aleksandr Chabrov, and Natalya Lisenko. == Actors == *Pavel Pavlov as Pavel, painter, hunchback *Aleksandr Chabrov as Satan *Natalya Lisenko as Esther, Sandro's mother *Ivan Mozzhukhin as Pastor Talnoх and his son Sandro van Gauguin *Vera Orlova as Inga == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1917 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:Movies directed by Yakov Protazanov
title: Satan Triumphant
